resources.string:
Welcome to the Donate Me App!

With this app you are able to see who is need of a donation based help around you. You also are able to direct donate money or getting into contact with the organization for other donations. 
 
If you need help, you are welcome to request donations in the app. You can specify your organization, description, pictures, location, and donation request.
Create an account to get started!
The organization will give instructions for non monetary donation will be made. Perhaps through a phone number to call, a website address, or a brief description and address of a dropoff point.
